metadata.title: CVE-2019-15145 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: DjVuLibre 3.5.27 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service attack(application crash via an out-of-bounds read) by crafting a corrupted JB2image file that is mishandled in JB2Dict::JB2Codec::get_direct_context inlibdjvu/JB2Image.h because of a missing zero-bytes check inlibdjvu/GBitmap.h.

criterions.comment: djvulibre: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
